data.actual_result: It changes automatically. Might be an issue that happens after some extended period time. There is nothing about it in the audit log. Note: I was also unable to change the filter from nothing to all members (must change it to members without roles first).
data.expected_result: `Explicit Content Filter` shouldn't change automatically to nothing.
data.short_description: Moderation: "Explicit Content Filter" changes automatically to "Don't scan any messages"
data.steps_to_repro: - Have `Explicit Content Filter` activated (members without role or all members option) - Go to `Server settings` -> `Moderation` - Observe how `Explicit Content Filter` changed
